abstract: Light bomber Douglas A-20A to be tested
snippet: DAYTON, Ohio--Wright Field test pilots revealed last week that they would soon test a  new light bomber, the Douglas A-20A, a model similar to the bombers being manufactured by the Douglas Company in Santa Monica, Calif., for export to the British...
lead_paragraph: DAYTON, Ohio--Wright Field test pilots revealed last week that they would soon test a new light bomber, the Douglas A-20A, a model similar to the bombers being manufactured by the Douglas Company in Santa Monica, Calif., for export to the British. They said that the new bomber would be flown here from the West Coast "probably some time next week."
